services.title: OUR INTELLIGENT SOLUTIONS
services.subtitle: We develop technologies that transform how companies operate, focusing on real and measurable results.

automation.title: INTELLIGENT AUTOMATION
automation.description: Automate repetitive processes, integrate systems, and boost productivity with custom bots designed for your business.
automation.longDescription: We develop automation solutions that eliminate manual tasks, reduce human errors, and significantly increase your company's productivity. We seamlessly integrate all your tools into a continuous workflow.
automation.benefits: Reduce operational costs by up to 40%

ai.title: AI-POWERED SOLUTIONS
ai.description: Advanced chatbots, natural language processing, and content generation powered by the latest AI technologies.
ai.longDescription: We implement cutting-edge artificial intelligence technologies that transform data into valuable insights, automate complex decisions, and elevate your customers' experience to unprecedented levels.
ai.benefits: Increase operational efficiency by up to 60%

custom.title: CUSTOM SYSTEMS
custom.description: Development of SaaS platforms, internal tools, and dashboards tailored to your business's specific needs.
custom.longDescription: We create comprehensive, personalized systems that precisely meet your business requirements, from executive dashboards to complex e-commerce platforms and enterprise management systems.

data.title: DATA + CLOUD
data.description: Data collection, analysis, and visualization powered by AI for valuable insights and informed decision-making.
data.longDescription: We provide comprehensive solutions to collect, process, and visualize data in real-time, enabling your company to make data-driven decisions based on concrete insights rather than intuition.
data.benefits: Get insights up to 5x faster for decision-making

cases.title: REAL PROJECTS WITH MEASURABLE RESULTS
cases.subtitle: Discover some of the projects we've developed and the concrete, measurable results we've helped our clients achieve.

case1.title: The Future of English
case1.description: We developed an innovative digital platform to facilitate document translation across multiple languages using advanced Artificial Intelligence, delivering a simple, fast, and reliable experience for individuals and businesses.

case2.title: Lush America Translations
case2.description: We created an innovative platform for translating official and academic documents using cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence, ensuring fast, consistent, and secure translations across multiple languages.

case3.title: Educational Guidance Platform
case3.description: We developed the Matrícula USA platform, a comprehensive solution for international students seeking educational opportunities in the United States, streamlining the entire admission process.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services and how we can help transform your business.

q1.question: Is this real AI technology?
q1.answer: Absolutely. We utilize cutting-edge AI technologies including GPT-4, Claude, and proprietary models. This isn't just marketing—we implement genuine artificial intelligence applications that deliver tangible, measurable results for your business.

q2.question: Do I need programming knowledge?
q2.answer: Not at all. Our solutions are designed to be intuitive and user-friendly, regardless of your technical background. Our expert team handles all the technical aspects, so you can focus on your business goals.

q3.question: What are your pricing options?
q3.answer: Pricing varies based on project complexity and scope. We offer customized plans that align with your company's specific needs and budget. Contact us for a detailed, personalized proposal tailored to your requirements.

q4.question: What's the typical delivery timeline?
q4.answer: Timelines depend on project complexity, but our agile approach enables incremental deliveries starting from the first few weeks. Simple projects typically complete in 2-4 weeks, while more complex solutions may take 2-3 months.

q5.question: Can you automate our existing tools?
q5.answer: Absolutely! One of our core specialties is integrating and automating existing systems. We can seamlessly connect your current tools (CRM, ERP, spreadsheets, etc.) and create automated workflows between them.
